channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Smooth Scroll Page Up/Down Buttons
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Smooth Scroll Page Up/Down Buttons

item.title: CVE-2021-24331|2024-08-03T19:28:23.411Z -- unknown -- smooth%20scroll%20page%20up%2Fdown%20buttons
item.description: The Smooth Scroll Page Up/Down Buttons WordPress plugin before 1.4 did not properly sanitise and validate its settings, such as psb_distance, psb_buttonsize, psb_speed, only validating them client side. This could allow high privilege users (such as admin) to set XSS payloads in them
